div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
قد أسجلتك يـأ پا عپد الله محمد ين پرپد العشيريّ القشيريّ
عشرين فدّان أرض طين نقا بمزرعة يحين
بالسعر الواقع بالبلد فازرع على بركة اللّه
وعونه ولك الوفا بذلك وما تزيّدت فبحساب وذلك
لخراج سنة سبع وأربعين وثلثماية الخراجيّة وكتب
يعقوب بن عبد اللّه بخطّه في رجب من سنة ثمان
وأربعين وثلثماية وصلّى اللّه على سيّدي محمّد النّبي
وآله وسلّم تسليما والحمد للّه رب العالمين

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
qad ʾasǧaltu ka yā ʾabā ʿabdi ăl lāhi muḥammadu bnu yazīda ăl ʿaskariyyu ʿušayriyyu qušayriyyu
ʿišrīna faddān ʾarḍa ṭīn:in niqāʾa bi mazraʿaẗi yaḥyà
bi ăs siʿri ăl wāqiʿi bi ăl baladi fa ĭzraʿ ʿalà barakaẗi ăl lāhi
wa ʿawni hi wa la ka ăl wafāʾu bi ḏālika wa mā tazayyadta fa bi ḥisāb:in wa ḏālika
li ḫarāǧi sanaẗi sabʿ:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa ṯalāṯi miyaẗ:ini ăl ḫarāǧiyyaẗi wa kataba
yaʿqūbu bnu ʿabdi ăl lāhi bi ḫaṭṭi hi fī raǧab:in min sanaẗi ṯamān:in
wa ʾarbaʿīna wa ṯalāṯi miyaẗ:in wa ṣallà ăl lāhu ʿalà sayyid ī muḥammad:ini ăn nabiyyi
wa ʾāli hi wa sallama taslīm:an wa ăl ḥamdu li l lāhi rabbi ăl ʿālamīna

Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
I have already registered for thee, oh Abû ʿAbdallâh Muḥammad b. Zaid al-Askarî, Je t’ai affermé, ô Abū ʿAbd Allāh Muḥammad b. Yazīd al-ʿAskarī,
twenty faddâns of clean clay-earth belonging to the plantation of Yaḥyâ vingt faddān-s de terre propre labourable, dans la plantation de Yaḥyā,
at the rate actually in use in the disctrict. Sow, then, with the blessing au prix courant dans le district. Sème avec la bénédiction de Dieu
and help of God, the performance thereof being thine. What thou hast done in addition shall be (carried) on to (thy) account, viz. et son secours, à toi incombe d’exécuter cela. En ce qui concerne ce que tu fais en excédent, il y aura un compte (à régler), et ceci
for the impost of the ḫarâğî-year three hundred and forty seven, and Yaʿqûb pour l’impôt de l’année fiscale trois cent-quarante-sept. A écrit
b. ʿAbdallâh has written (it) in his (own) handwriting in Rağab of the year three hundred Yaʿqūb b. ʿAbd Allāh, de sa main, en raǧab de l’année
and forty eight. May the blessing of God be upon my lord Muḥammad the Prophet trois cent-qurante-huit. Que Dieu bénisse mon seigneur le Prophète
and upon his family, and may He give him peace. Praise be to God, the Lord of all created beings. et sa famille abondamment. Grâce à Dieu Seigneur des mondes.
